Honey Girl Organics H2GO (2019 formulation)

Brand: Honey Girl Organics

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Organic Coconut Oil, Organic Beeswax, Organic Jojoba Oil, Organic Bergamot Essential Oil, Organic German Chamomile Oil (Matricaria Recutica), Organic Coconut Extract
Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
